data.name: MegaBlasters!
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD!


About the Game



MegaBlasters! is a goofy online physics-based FPS where you find creative ways to kill other blasters!



  • Play with 3 other blasters, either friends or random (all wrigglin' around)
  • Chaotic physics based guns
  • 100+ Chaotic physics maps (with destructive maps for destructive people)
  • Quick in-game chat (distract n' kill lol)
  • Make someone go boom (sus bomb)
  • Noodle limbs (cuz why not)
  • Punch with your noodle hands

data.short_description: MegaBlasters! is a goofy online physics-based FPS where you find creative ways to kill other blasters!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 @2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 @3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
